description.effect.elenaidodge2.feathers: Increases feathers amount for a limited time.
description.effect.elenaidodge2.weight: Turns all feathers to stone and removes the Endurance effect.
description.effect.elenaidodge2.enduranc: Lower the player's weight and in turn give them access to more feathers.
description.effect.elenaidodge2.forceful: Increases the distance the player will dodge.
description.effect.elenaidodge2.feeble: Decreases the distance the player will dodge.
